content: no sew fish cat toy thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items finished size 3 long x 1 wide materials worsted weight #4 yarn o 20 yards 3 75mm hook needle scissors small amount of fiber fill cat nip optional gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch st -stitch chain -chain single_crochet -single_crochet increase -increase double_crochet -double_crochet pattern notes this pattern is constructed in 3 parts head bones tail # st means one st in each stitch for # stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items head with blue round 1 in magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 2 *single_crochet increase* 3 times 9 3 single_crochet in each st 9 4 *2 single_crochet increase* 3 times 12 5 single_crochet in each st 12 6 *3 single_crochet increase* 3 times 15 7 single_crochet in each st 15 lightly stuff and add catnip optional 8 fold edge flat and place 8 single_crochet across edge to close weave in ends use black yarn to embroider an x for eyes on both sides bones with white step 1 attach with slip_stitch to 4th st of head edge 2 ** chain 5 3 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook 4 slip_stitch in next 2 chain ** 3 times 5 chain 3 6 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook 7 slip_stitch in next chain tail tip made now working back up the bones on opposite side ** 8 slip_stitch in next base chain 9 chain 4 10 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook 11 slip_stitch in next 2 chain ** 12 slip_stitch in next base chain 3 times 13 slip_stitch in 5th st of head edge fasten_off weave in ends designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items tail with blue step 1 attach with slip_stitch to tip of tail all following sts with be worked into this tip ** 2 chain 2 3 2 double_crochet 4 chain 2 ** 5 slip_stitch 2 times fasten_off weave in ends reference photo enjoy your new no sew fish cat toy if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
